title: Savory Breakfast Flatbread Pizza
description: A quick and delicious breakfast or brunch pizza featuring crispy bacon, fluffy eggs, and melted cheese on a convenient flatbread base.

ingredients.item: Shredded cheese (cheddar, mozzarella, or a blend)

instructions.instruction: Cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy. Remove bacon, drain on paper towels, and crumble once cooled. Reserve a small amount of bacon fat if desired for cooking eggs.

In a bowl, whisk eggs with milk or cream, salt, and pepper until well combined. In the same skillet (or a separate non-stick pan), add a little olive oil or reserved bacon fat. Pour in egg mixture and scramble until cooked through but still soft.
Place the flatbreads on a baking sheet. Lightly brush the edges with a bit of olive oil if desired.
Divide the scrambled eggs evenly between the two flatbreads. Sprinkle the crumbled bacon over the eggs.
Top each flatbread with shredded cheese.
Bake for 8-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly and the flatbread edges are slightly golden.
Remove from oven, slice, and serve immediately.
